GET_STARTED.TITLE: Yet to start ?
GET_STARTED.MESSAGE: You seem to have still not configured this feature </br>for your organization. Enjoy a seamless experience </br>of the system and explore it to its potential.

VALIDATION_MSG.PASSWORD:
Enter valid password.
- include both uppercase & lowercase characters
- include minimum one number & one symbol/special characters
- should be 08 characters or more.

CODE.0: There seems to be issues with internet connectivity. Please check your connection.
CODE.401: The username and/or password is incorrect. Please check your credentials.
CODE.403: You are not authorized to access this content.
CODE.404: We are sorry, the page you've requested is not available.
CODE.500: We are sorry, we have encountered some error.If the issue persists, please contact the support team.

USERNAME.LABEL: Username
USERNAME.VALIDATION_ERROR: Enter valid email or phone number.

FORGOT_PASSWORD.TITLE: Forgot Password ?

RESET_PASSWORD.TITLE: Reset Password
RESET_PASSWORD.SUB_TITLE: Enter a password that you will remember. Please make sure you keep is safe and secure.

TOKEN.VALIDATION_ERROR: This link is invalid and has missing valid token. Please check your email for the correct reset link.

AVATAR.LABEL: Avatar
AVATAR.FINE_TEXT: The image file should be of jpg, png

LAST_NAME.LABEL: Last Name
LAST_NAME.PLACEHOLDER: Enter the surname or family name

PHONE.LABEL: Phone
PHONE.FINE_TEXT: This number will be used to contact the user in case of any issues with the account. In case you have configured Cloud Telephony services, this number will be used to connect for calls and messages.

EMAIL.LABEL: Email Address
EMAIL.FINE_TEXT: Email will not be publicly displayed and just used to communicate.

USERNAME.LABEL: Username
USERNAME.FINE_TEXT: Email address is the default username.

PASSWORD.LABEL: Password
PASSWORD.FINE_TEXT: Password to include uppercase & lowercase letters, numbers, and characters. Minimum 8 characters required.
PASSWORD.VALIDATION_ERROR: Enter valid password as per given policy

LANGUAGE.LABEL: Language
LANGUAGE.FINE_TEXT: Default language is English. Select the language that best suits.

TIMEZONE.LABEL: Timezone
TIMEZONE.FINE_TEXT: Default language is English. Select the language that best suits you.

REMOTE_ONLY.LABEL: Remote Access Only
REMOTE_ONLY.PLACEHOLDER: Allow restricted application access for remote integration.
REMOTE_ONLY.FINE_TEXT:
The feature allows the user to interact with the application remotely. This feature should be enabled for accessing the data or saving data over REST API.

For safety reasons, the user will not have Console Access.

DEACTIVATE_ACCOUNT.LABEL: Deactivate the user account ?
DEACTIVATE_ACCOUNT.FINE_TEXT: Important: This action will disable the user account and shall prohibit the user from using the application.

ACTIVATE_ACCOUNT.LABEL: Activate the account ?
ACTIVATE_ACCOUNT.FINE_TEXT: Important: This will enable the user account. beware, the user will be allowed to use that application.

LOGO.LABEL: Logo
LOGO.FINE_TEXT: The image file should be square (ratio 1:1) with jpg, png extensions.

NAME.LABEL: Name
NAME.FINE_TEXT: Your invoices will be addressed to this company.

KEY.LABEL: Key

FIRST_ACTION_CARD.TITLE: Upload Document
FIRST_ACTION_CARD.DETAILS:
Organize yourself better by storing the right documents.
You can upload your documents with us. We keep it safe and secure.

FIRST_ACTION_CARD.TITLE: Create Note
FIRST_ACTION_CARD.DETAILS:
Worried about remembering and keeping scribes in some paper?
You can write a note here and we will rememeber it for you in the right context, making you future ready.

FIRST_ACTION_CARD.TITLE: Create Request
FIRST_ACTION_CARD.DETAILS:
To create new leads, opportunities and support requests,
click the plus sign and select the desired menu from the list.
